Name: Graveyard Spells
About the game: This game is an action game which combines elements of classic retro-shooter and low poly style. FAST FPS inspired by 90s games You play as a vampire who will have to survive waves of enemies, with a cemetery as a backdrop. Fight by casting spells. A variety of spells at your disposal Various enemies, melee, ranged, with their own abilities The enemies arrive in waves, and in the very last wave there will be a boss A survival mode to challenge you with infinite spawn Bonuses to collect on the map A cemetery atmosphere Fluid Movement Controller supported once in game [/] Graveyard Spells an experience from beyond the grave
